code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec min_sum(nums1 :: [integer], nums2 :: [integer]) :: integer
  def min_sum(nums1, nums2) do
    sum1 = Enum.sum(nums1)
    sum2 = Enum.sum(nums2)
    zeros1 = Enum.count(nums1, &(&1 == 0))
    zeros2 = Enum.count(nums2, &(&1 == 0))

    if zeros1 + zeros2 == 0 do
      if sum1 == sum2, do: sum1, else: -1
    else
      higher_sum = max(sum1, sum2)
      lower_sum = min(sum1, sum2)
      diff = higher_sum - lower_sum

      if diff == 0 do
        higher_sum + max(zeros1, zeros2)
      else
        if diff <= max(zeros1, zeros2) - min(zeros1, zeros2) do
          new_sum = higher_sum + max(zeros1, zeros2)
          if new_sum > lower_sum + min(zeros1, zeros2) + diff do
            new_sum
          else
            -1
          end
        else
          -1
        end
      end
    end
  end
end
